channel.title: Lake-George on Vinod Kurup
channel.description: Recent content in Lake-George on Vinod Kurup

item.title: 6th Annual Cousins Trip
item.description: Cousins Trip 2005 (photos) was in Lake George, NY this year. The weather didn’t quite cooperate this time. It was cloudy and rainy all week. Still, we were able to get in a great hike, some competitive bowling, basketball and mini-golf, not to mention enjoying the 2nd annual Elvis Festival. While we didn’t run into any bears, we did see plenty of wildlife. Of course, I would be a rumpcake if I were to forget to mention our late-night Taboo contests, the highlight of the trip.
